fact: In 'Hot Rod', Rod's stunts fail so epically that he becomes the true master of unintentional comedy, redefining what it means to be a stunt performer.
reply: Sure, Rod can't land a stunt, but he sure lands the laughs. Master of crashes, king of comedy!
youtube_description: Rod's epic fails in 'Hot Rod' redefine stunt mastery! #HotRod #ComedyGold #EpicFails #movies
